alert.note: Alert for Amelia; Charles City; Chesterfield; City of Colonial Heights; City of Hopewell; City of Petersburg; City of Richmond; Goochland; Hanover; Henrico; King William; Powhatan; Prince George (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 5:55PM EDT until June 02 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... The City of Colonial Heights in central Virginia... The City of Hopewell in south central Virginia... The northeastern City of Petersburg in south central Virginia... Southeastern Goochland County in central Virginia... Southern Hanover County in central Virginia... Powhatan County in central Virginia... The City of Richmond in central Virginia... Chesterfield County in central Virginia... West central Charles City County in east central Virginia... Northwestern Prince George County in south central Virginia... Henrico County in central Virginia... West central King William County in east central Virginia... Northeastern Amelia County in central Virginia... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 554 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Macon, or near Powhatan, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Moseley and Sabot around 605 PM EDT. Manakin around 610 PM EDT. University Of Richmond and Bon Air around 620 PM EDT. Richmond, Virginia Commonwealth University, Downtown Richmond, Virginia Union University, Bensley, Bellwood and Lakeside around 625 PM EDT. Highland Springs and East Highland Park around 630 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Montrose, Sandston, Glendale, Pocahontas State Park, Skinquarter, Beach, Chamberlayne, Fine Creek Mills, Michaux and Atlee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.

area.areaDesc: Amelia; Charles City; Chesterfield; City of Colonial Heights; City of Hopewell; City of Petersburg; City of Richmond; Goochland; Hanover; Henrico; King William; Powhatan; Prince George
